abstract: Putting aside from the challenges facing Citigroup, Vikram S. Pandit, the bank’s chief executive, said he believed the world should embrace the “U.S. model” of development in order to foster long-term and sustainable economic growth.
snippet: Putting aside from the challenges facing Citigroup, Vikram S. Pandit, the bank’s chief executive, said he believed the world should embrace the “U.S. model” of development in order to foster long-term and sustainable economic growth.
lead_paragraph: Vikram S. Pandit, the chief executive of Citigroup, must have welcomed the chance on Monday to talk about something other than the challenges facing his bank and the overall financial industry.

headline.main: A Change of Topics for Pandit: World Growth
